divs: sighting detailsi was on the poarch having a cigarette when i noticed a very bright light about 45 degrees above the horizon quite some distant away (more than 10 miles). it seemed to be pulsating or shimmering then faded\disappeared for a few seconds, then re appeared for a few more seconds before disappearing completely. the sighting lasted between 10-15 seconds. i live under a main aircraft approach path into chicago and i am a private pilot. the object was in the area where jets heading into chicago usually are visible. i have watched hundreds of planes and this was not like any lights i have seen before. it was very bright, too bright to me to have been an aircrft landing light, especially since it was a bright sunny day around noon. i have seen many of such lights, but none have shown the chactoristics this light displayed. i have a pair of binoculars on the poarch and while i didn't think to grab them when the object was visible, after it disappeared i search the area with binoculars, as well flight path that it would have taken had it been an aircraft going to chicago and did not see anything.
Summary: Pulsating or shimmering light. Very bright.
trends: There has been one other sighting in North Liberty
There were no other sightings in North Liberty on or around August 19th 2013
